divs: sighting detailsspotted similar object as previous sightings starlike with multiple colored lights low hovering less than a mile to the east at around 9:30 pm on 3\3\2013,contacted paranormal investigators who arrived at approximately 11:00 pm at which time we lost object to the east ,but reappeared to the southwest,then spotted two more objects during duration of sighting 1st was southwest had same lights as before of red,blue,green,and white\yellow flashing randomly.then spotted another similar object to the northwest,then another object appeared due west but had a reddish-orange hue to it and remained in area the longest to approximately 2:30 am on 3\4\2013. the reddish-orange object cast a spotlight or beam toward the ground at one point. investigators took multiple pictures,at least one picture turned out good showing hovering object to the southwest.hopefully more evidence will be obtained to show what we've been seeing and what has been worrying my family the past couple weeks. this is the 5th sighting since 2\16\13,we had 5 witnesses to sighting 3\3\13 through 3\4\13. i don't have pictures,but assume investigators will post them or send me copies today so that i can post them.
Summary: 5th sighting since 2/16/13 saw 3 objects at various times had more witnesses this time
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Falmouth
There were no other sightings in Falmouth on or around March 3rd 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
